== Paduvilayi (CT) (627274) ==

Paduvilayi (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 15.08 sq. km. and harbouring 4213 households with total population of 20598 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 19 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 507 km. Male population is 9748 and female population is 10850. Scheduled Caste population is 192 and Scheduled Tribes population is 61. Census Location Code of the town is 627274<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 75 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 83 km. Railway station is at Thalassery at a distance of 15 km.
